chunks.zh: 我终于不再懒惰，开了自己的博客，欢迎访问！
chunks.en: I am finally no longer lazy and have started my own blog, welcome to visit!

chunks.zh:
之前一直把 V 站当自己的博客来用，但因为种种原因决定还是自己开一个。本着独乐乐不如众乐乐的精神，其实是做了一个博客站。如果喜欢站点的风格也欢迎来一起写。

https://write.c7.io/snullp/hello-world

欢迎大家来做客！
chunks.en:
I have been using V2EX as my blog, but for various reasons, I decided to start my own. In the spirit of sharing the joy, I have actually created a blog site. If you like the style of the site, you are also welcome to write together.

https://write.c7.io/snullp/hello-world

Welcome everyone to visit!

chunks.zh: 汏啲菘癙βèň菿傷   为什么用这么杀马特的标题
chunks.en: 汏啲菘癙βèň菿傷 Why use such a non-mainstream title

chunks.zh: 看到 Fediverse ，不错。今天的好心情+1
chunks.en: Saw Fediverse, nice. Good mood today +1

chunks.zh: @erquren 哈哈哈不觉得很好玩吗
chunks.en: @erquren Hahaha, don't you think it's fun?

chunks.zh: 非常好的博客，使我的蝴蝶旋转
chunks.en: Very good blog, makes my butterflies spin

chunks.zh: 那就晒晒：https://yinji.org
chunks.en: Then show off: https://yinji.org

chunks.zh: 博客名字很火星
chunks.en: The blog name is very Martian

chunks.zh: 这个博客我需要 45 度角仰望吗
chunks.en: Do I need to look up at this blog at a 45-degree angle?

chunks.zh: @via 可以 45 角俯视
chunks.en: @via You can look down at a 45-degree angle

chunks.zh: 看到你的我才更新一下我的。https://www.imclouder.com/
chunks.en: Seeing yours, I will update mine. https://www.imclouder.com/

chunks.zh: 没有评论功能有点可惜啊
chunks.en: It's a pity there is no comment function

chunks.zh: @naminokoe 可以给我发邮件啊
chunks.en: @naminokoe You can send me an email

chunks.zh: @lairdnote 博客中那个在杯子里的小狗有现成的第三方库吗
chunks.en: @lairdnote Is there a ready-made third-party library for the little dog in the cup in the blog?

chunks.zh: 汏啲菘癙βèň菿傷It is okay if you can't read this
chunks.en: 汏啲菘癙βèň菿傷It is okay if you can't read this

chunks.zh: 域名好短啊，怎么搞的
chunks.en: The domain name is so short, how did you get it?

chunks.zh: 这名字竟然看不懂 😅
chunks.en: I can’t understand this name 😅

chunks.zh: 我的博客 https://lynan.cn/ 欢迎来踩
chunks.en: My blog https://lynan.cn/ welcome to visit

chunks.zh: 晒一个  https://blog.ryuichi.life/
chunks.en: Show one  https://blog.ryuichi.life/

chunks.zh: 今年才开始重新写： https://sulinehk.com/
chunks.en: Just started rewriting this year: https://sulinehk.com/

chunks.zh: https://🍚.eu.org那就蹭蹭
chunks.en: https://🍚.eu.org Then rub against it

chunks.zh: 看到这标题，死去的回忆开始攻击我
chunks.en: Seeing this title, dead memories start to attack me
